channel.title: Michael Salim Blogs
channel.description: This is my personal blog posts

item.title: I have a new Junior Developer and it kinda sucks
item.description: ChatGPT is all the rage these days. Is it really that good for developers though?
item.author: hi@michaelsalim.co.uk (Michael Salim)

item.title: Making YouTube video with React
item.description: I wanted a good animation for my first YouTube video. But with no experience with tools like After Effects, what can I do? React JS to the rescue!
item.author: hi@michaelsalim.co.uk (Michael Salim)

item.title: 300 Signups, No Product, Only Landing page
item.description: I got 300 Signups with a simple landing page. No product, no nothing. Here's what happened.
item.author: hi@michaelsalim.co.uk (Michael Salim)

item.title: I have 218 browser tabs open
item.description: It's been decades since the invention of browser tabs. Now, everybody uses them. What does the future of tabs look like?
item.author: hi@michaelsalim.co.uk (Michael Salim)

item.title: Rust from 0 to 80% for JavaScript Developers
item.description: Learn Rust to 80% in 5 minutes by leveraging your existing JavaScript knowledge. In this article, I list a number of differences Rust has compared to JS that is crucial to understanding it.
item.author: hi@michaelsalim.co.uk (Michael Salim)

item.title: Can you re-create this web component?
item.description: Are you a confident front-end developer? Try to re-create this pagination component from GitHub. In this article, I talk about how seemingly simple task can take a long time without proper evaluation.
item.author: hi@michaelsalim.co.uk (Michael Salim)
